subject: Sales
title: BATNA: Your Best Alternative
description: One-minute skill: BATNA: Your Best Alternative.

hook.text: A candidate with two job offers negotiates boldly. One with zero offers takes whatever comes.

buildup.text: BATNA stands for Best Alternative to a Negotiated Agreement. It's your walk-away power.

discovery.text: Fisher and Ury coined the term. Your BATNA sets the floor: never accept less than your backup.

twist.text: The other side has a BATNA too. If theirs is stronger, you're negotiating from weakness.

climax.text: Before any negotiation, improve your alternative. A stronger backup makes every offer better.

punchline.text: A strong Plan B makes your Plan A unstoppable.

quiz.question: What does BATNA stand for?
